posts.post_title: Large Selection of T206 for sale
posts.post_content:
Large Selection of T206 for sale in this week's Steiner Auction.

[URL="https://auction.steinersports.com/Category/Pre_War-241.html"]https://auction.steinersports.com/Category/Pre_War-241.html[/URL]

Thanks
I feel that the opening prices for Steiner auctions are grossssssssly high.

Yeah, interesting strategy.  Looks like 4 of those lots may get bids.  

Also, you've posted this in the wrong section, and "Sweet Caporal" is spelled wrong in a few of those listings.

and that surprises you why  :)  LOL

Barry
Just curious why we are being informed about t206's in a Steiner auction?  Yes I agree the starting prices are high 25% over where I could buy a similar card on ebay and thats without the juice.
